name: Charmed Mini Crossbody
description: Like the Charmed Crossbody, this purse is handmade in New Orleans of buttery soft leather and features a black and gold sparkle lining with a gold chain and a removable leather tassel. But unlike the Charmed Crossbody, this little gal isn't made to hold the kitchen sink. Perfect for a night on the town, the mini is made to hold just your essentials. You know, like 3 tubes of lipstick, some gum, a Twix, powder for your nose and an id. When they say nice to meet you, all you have to say back is, "Charmed." 8" x 6" P.S. The NBA passed some new purse restrictions, but this purse meets those regulations. Cheers to being fashionably compliant!

name: Coveted Crossbody: Black
description:
It's called Coveted for a reason. You'll adore it, women will envy you for it. Buttery soft, this crossbody bag is all about the details, featuring black and gold interior, a burgundy tassel and tiny burgundy tabs that attach the heavy gold chain. Go on, adore it. It's yours for the taking. 

Handmade in New Orleans. 

Custom orders are being taken and take approximately 1-2 weeks to be crafted. Please message me with your request.

name: Totally Clear: Black
description: Just because the NFL implemented new purse policies doesn't mean we have to sacrifice fashion! Introducing our latest design, the Totally Clear tote, featuring black shoulder straps, minimal gold detailing and a detachable handmade leather tassel. Don't worry, we won't let you be a victim of a Ziploc. Comes with your choice of a fabric wallet that also meets the NFL bag guidelines. Proudly made in America. #TotallyClear #ClearlyChic Height: 12" Width: 10" See the brown handle version here!

options.name: Black and White Dots, Red zipper

name: Cherished Mini Tan
description:
"Though she be but little, she is fierce!"

Hold your essentials in this mini version of the Cherished Clutch. Handcrafted in New Orleans and made of soft tan leather and featuring a large tassel and navy and white chevron lining. It's buttery and cute!

P.S. It meets the NFL guidelines, so stash one inside your clear purse or carry it alone to the game! 4.5" x 6.5"

name: Charmed Crossbody
description:
Go on, fill it up. This spacious crossbody purse is handmade in New Orleans of burgundy leather and features a black and gold sparkle lining with gold chain and a leather tassel. When they say nice to meet you, all you have to say back is, "Charmed." 

#StaySassy #CharmedCrossbody 

Sold out, but pre-orders are being accepted! Just message us with your request and we will be happy to oblige. Custom orders take 1-2 weeks for production plus shipping time.

name: Cherished Mini Plum/Black
description:
"Though she be but little, she is fierce!"

Hold your essentials in this mini version of the Cherished Clutch. Handcrafted in New Orleans and made of plum leather on one side, black on the other and featuring a black tassel and black and gold lining. It's buttery and cute!

P.S. It meets the NFL guidelines, so stash one inside your clear purse or carry it alone to the game! 4.5" x 6.5"

name: Cherished Mini Black
description:
"Though she be but little, she is fierce!" 

Hold your essentials in this mini version of the Cherished Clutch. Handcrafted in New Orleans and made of soft leather featuring a light grey tassel and red and white striped lining. It's buttery and cute!

P.S. It meets the NFL guidelines, so stash one inside your clear purse or carry it alone to the game! 4.5" x 6.5"

name: Cherished Clutch Two Tone
description:
Hold all your necessities in this handmade oversized clutch made of soft leather featuring a brass YKK zipper and handmade tassel. Clutch it tight, you won't want to let go. 

#ClutchItGood 

Handmade in New Orleans. Custom orders welcome. Please allow 2 weeks for the handcrafting process. 

13" wide x 11" tall when flat

name: Cherished Clutch Black
description:
Hold all your necessities in this handmade oversized clutch made of soft leather featuring a brass zipper and handmade tassel. Clutch it tight, you won't want to let go. 

Handmade in New Orleans. Custom orders welcome. Please allow 2 weeks for the handcrafting process.

name: Gift Card
description: Not sure what clear purse that stylish football-lovin' gal wants, or what size Stay Gold pullover she'll want to snuggle up in? Get her a gift card and let her pick it out herself! Available in $25 and $50 increments.

name: Cherished Clutch Tan
description: Hold all your necessities in this handmade oversized clutch made of soft leather featuring a brass zipper and handmade tassel. Clutch it tight, you won't want to let go. Available Dec. 5 at our debut party at Langford Market on Magazine Street! Available online on Dec. 6.

name: Nocturnal by Nature
description:
Nocturnal by nature, you seek adventure by the moonlight. Let this crescent moon guide you along your wildest dreams. The fit is drapey in the body and sleeves, so you can breathe easy but still look sassy. 

Tri-blend dolman. Model is wearing a size medium. 

#BatsandCats #NotCauseIHateYa

name: Who Bat
description:
They call it super for a reason. Our dome is our home. Now wear it proud and ask the world, "Who dat say dey gonna beat dem Saints?" 

Soft tri-blend vintage black crewneck. Model is wearing a Large. 

#WhoBat #Superhome

name: Stay Gold: Black
description: Soft and sassy long sleeved pullover with a wide scoop neck that falls off the shoulder just so, featuring gold metallic letters originally hand painted by Tiffany. Available now in black and white. Get cozy and stay gold. #goldenrule See it in white here.

name: Cajun Stardust Make Up Bag
description:
We are all Cajun Stardust. An alligator painted by New Orleans artist Erica Lambertson adorns one side. The words "Cajun Stardust" painted by Tiffany Napper decorate the flip side. Carry your makeup or other tidbits around in style in this wipe-clean pouch, perfect for organizing smaller items within your larger bags. 

Details: 
- Top zip closure
- PVC
- 9"W x 6"H

name: KREWE The Fly | Flat Black & Gold
description:
Flat Black | Lightly Mirrored Gold Lenses

The Fly is KREWE's take on the wayfarer styling. It's unisex style tends to fit everyone who puts them on, and are finished with real riveted 5-barrel hinges for strength and durability. The Fly is perfect for any #BatPack outing: Saturdays at the ballgame, Sundays at the park, Mondays on the drive to work. 

*Italian Acetate Frames Renewable, Biodegradable, and Hypoallergenic
*Optics by Carl Zeiss, Prescription Ready
*100% UVA/UVB protection
*Size 52-17-145

name: KREWE Toulouse | Bone
description:
Bone | Blue Slate Lenses

Toulouse is KREWE’s interpretation of the timeless “P3” styling. Its oversized key-hole and wayfarer-esque temples give a nod to vintage styling while being firmly planted in the now. From proportion and fit, to sizing and design, it's one of those styles that works extremely well on just about anyone who puts them on, male or female. Perfect for a #BatPack member. 

*Italian Acetate Frames Renewable, Biodegradable, and Hypoallergenic
*Optics by Carl Zeiss, Prescription Ready
*100% UVA/UVB protection
*Size 50-18-142

name: Totally Clear: Brown
description: Just because the NFL implemented new purse policies doesn't mean we have to sacrifice fashion! Introducing our latest design, the Totally Clear tote, featuring black or brown shoulder straps, minimal gold detailing and a detachable handmade leather tassel. Don't worry, we won't let you be a victim of a Ziploc. Comes with your choice of a fabric wallet that also meets the NFL bag guidelines. Proudly made in America. #TotallyClear #ClearlyChic Height: 12" Width: 10" See the black handle version here!

options.name: Black and White Dots with red zipper

name: Stay Gold Make Up Bag
description:
Make it your golden rule to Stay Gold, even on the go. Perfect for organizing all your girlie goodies within larger totes and bags, this sassy wipe-clean bag is great for for make up, toiletries, jewels, and whatever else you can think to put in it!

#StayGold #MakeMeUp

Details: 
- Top zip closure
- PVC
- 9"W x 6"H
- Featuring letters originally hand painted by Tiffany Napper. Matches our Stay Gold pullover!

name: Clearly Gunmetal
description:
Part party, part rock 'n' roll. Adorned with an accommodating crossbody strap, this cute, convertible clear purse features gunmetal hardware and comes with one handmade fabric wallet of your choice. Together or alone, both the purse and the wallet meet the new NFL guidelines for purses allowed into stadiums across the country. This purse is perfect for a night on the town or a day in the Dome! 

Purse measures 9" wide x 5.5" tall. Wallet measures 6" wide x 4.5" tall.

#Clearly #NFLapproved

name: Stay Gold: White
description: Soft and sassy long sleeved pullover with a wide scoop neck that falls off the shoulder just so, featuring gold metallic letters originally hand painted by Tiffany. Available now in black and white. No matter what, stay gold. #goldenrule See it in black here.

name: Clearly Silver
description:
We are clearly still making lemonade out of those NFL lemons with the debut of a brand new, very limited edition, clear purse with silver accents. Crossbody with the option to convert it into a clutch with the simple removal of the chain strap. This purse is so cute, you won't want to reserve it just for game day; it'll become your everyday bag. 

#Clearly #SilverNotGold

Comes with your choice of one handmade fabric pouch, size 6.5" x 4.5," which also meets the NFL rules and regulations.

From proportion and fit, to sizing and design, it's one of those styles that works extremely well on just about anyone who puts them on, male or female.

*Optics by Carl Zeiss, Prescription Ready

description:
Two Tone Champagne & Rue Tortoise | Gray Lenses

Toulouse is KREWE’s interpretation of the timeless “P3” styling. Its oversized key-hole and wayfarer-esque temples give a nod to vintage styling while being firmly planted in the now. From proportion and fit, to sizing and design, it's one of those styles that works extremely well on just about anyone who puts them on, male or female. Perfect for a #BatPack member. 

*Italian Acetate Frames Renewable, Biodegradable, and Hypoallergenic
*Optics by Carl Zeiss, Prescription Ready
*100% UVA/UVB protection
*Size 50-18-142

name: KREWE Toulouse | Black and Havana Tortoise
description:
Split Tone Black & Havana Tortoise | Gradient Amber Lenses

Toulouse is KREWE’s interpretation of the timeless “P3” styling. Its oversized key-hole and wayfarer-esque temples give a nod to vintage styling while being firmly planted in the now. From proportion and fit, to sizing and design, it's one of those styles that works extremely well on just about anyone who puts them on, male or female.

*Italian Acetate Frames Renewable, Biodegradable, and Hypoallergenic
*Optics by Carl Zeiss, Prescription Ready
*100% UVA/UVB protection
*Size 50-18-142

name: KREWE The Fly | Sunday Tortoise
description:
Sunday Tortoise | Gradient Amber Lenses

The Fly is perfect for any #BatPack outing: Saturdays at the ballgame, Sundays at the park, Mondays on the drive to work. Get your look fully together. It's all in the details.

*Italian Acetate Frames Renewable, Biodegradable, and Hypoallergenic
*Optics by Carl Zeiss, Prescription Ready
*100% UVA/UVB protection
*Size 52-17-145

name: KREWE The Fly | Tokyo Tortoise
description:
Matte Tokyo Tortoise | G13 Lenses

The Fly is KREWE's take on the wayfarer styling. It's unisex style tends to fit everyone who puts them on, and are finished with real riveted 5-barrel hinges for strength and durability. The #BatPack gal is so Fly, she'll rock these shades any time of day or night. 

*Italian Acetate Frames Renewable, Biodegradable, and Hypoallergenic
*Optics by Carl Zeiss, Prescription Ready
*100% UVA/UVB protection
*Size 52-17-145

*Shown on #BatPack gal: Winged Creatures tank, Clearly Convertible purse

name: KREWE Calliope | Midnight Tortoise
description:
Midnight Tortoise | Gray Lenses

Calli-ope is KREWE’s contemporary classic. It is a timeless re-model of cult designs from the ‘40s and ‘90s. It’s clean, almost rectangular lines, have the unique ability to elevate the wearer’s style when worn in any fashion to any place. 

* Italian Acetate Frames Renewable, Biodegradable, and Hypoallergenic
* Optics by Carl Zeiss, Prescription Ready
* 100% UVA/UVB protection
* Size 54-15-145

*Shown in bottom photo: Winged Creatures tank, Lucky Clutch, Made with Magic iPhone case

name: Made with Magic iPhone case
description:
Calling all dream girls. Wear it loud, wear it proud. 

White iPhone case sporting our favorite saying "Made with Magic." Available for both the iPhone 4/4S and iPhone 5. Now also available in blue! 

#dreamgirl #madewithmagic

name: Lucky Clutch
description:
It's hip to be clear. Consider this your lucky clutch for game day or any day! Minimalist. Square. Right on the money. Comes with your choice of a fabric wallet, handmade in New Orleans, size 4.5" x 6.5" to abide by the new NFL guidelines. 

#luckyduck #intheclear

9" wide x 7" tall

options.name: Black and White Dots with Red Zipper

name: Pouches
description:
Be free. Change your clear purse style depending on which way the wind is blowing. Or pick up extra pouches to use in your other purses for coins, makeup, and, shhh ... secrets! These pouches feature brass zippers and measure 6.5" wide x 4.5" tall. Handmade in New Orleans. 

#FreedomRules 

(6.5" x 4.5" is the maximum size opaque "purse" allowed by the new NFL guidelines. Ladies, we all know this isn't a purse, but at least it will hide your secrets!)

*Pouches are handmade, so please allow for slight variations in pattern placement.

options.name: Black and White Dots with Red Zipper
Navy and White Chevron with Red Zipper
Large Red and White Stripes with Royal Blue Zipper
Small Red and White Stripes with Royal Blue Zipper

name: Winged Creatures
description:
For the light and dark in us all, the Winged Creatures tank is a collaboration with artist Megan Victoria of Jupiter Lala. This super soft mint green racer back tank sports a proud, neon yellow bat and butterfly on the front. Tie it up and wear it with your favorite jeans and a cozy sweater. Throw it on for yoga class and get your om on. Or dress it up for a night on the town with a black mini skirt and leather jacket.

#WingedCreatures #DayandNight

name: Made with Magic
description:
Wear it proud, 'cause aren't you?  "Made with Magic" is our favorite saying around the Bats on Tees headquarters. So much so, that we made it our official tag line and slapped it on our favorite type of shirt - a super soft, white one!

#MadewithMagic

name: Carry It All
description:
This translucent bucket purse will fit everything you need for game day plus some! It comes with your choice of fabric pouches, handmade in New Orleans, to hide your money or unmentionables, and it features a black leather pull on the zipper and a see-through black bottom. Carry it all and still clear security with this cute bucket bag! 

#CarryItAll #Clearly

Measures 11" x 5.5" x 8" 
Pouch measures 4.5" x 6.5"

(The new NFL guidelines are 12" x 6" x 12" for a clear bag and 4.5" x 6.5" for an opaque clutch or wallet.)

options.name: Navy and White Chevron with Red Zipper
Red and White Stripes with Royal Blue Zipper
Black and White Dots with Red Zipper

name: Totally Milkshakes
description:
Canvas tote bag perfect for Saturdays, Sundays, Mondays, festival days. It's a pop song. It's got a hand drawing by Megan, and it's dipped one-by-one in a homemade dye of strawberries and beets. 

NOW AVAILABLE in indigo blue, too! 

A collaboration with artist and jeweler Megan Victoria of Jupiter Lala.

Milkshakable. #Yeahtotally. 

Tote Dimensions:  14"x15"

*Due to the hand dipping and homemade dye, no two bags are exactly the same. You'll be uniquely unique!

name: Clearly Convertible
description:
This purse is clearly perfect in every way! It's clear, so it meets the new NFL purse and bag regulations, plus it transforms from a crossbody to a clutch with the quick removal of the new and improved chain strap. Holds your essentials: phone, wallet, lipstick and sunglasses. It's so dang cute, you just might want to carry it all the time. 
5.5" x 9"

#Clearly #NFLapproved 

This clear purse comes with one 6.5" x 4.5" handmade fabric wallet featuring a brass zipper that also meets the new NFL guidelines. Breeze through security with this cute combo! 

P.S. Love those shades? Now you can buy New Orleans made KREWE sunglasses right here in our store!

options.name: Black and White Dots with red zipper
Dark Green and White Polka Dots
Red and White Strips and Royal Blue Zipper

name: Cajun Stardust
description:
The stars are smiling on you. Let that Cajun Stardust fall down all around you. 

Black cotton pullover featuring a hand-drawn alligator by New Orleans artist Erica Lambertson and a gold embroidered star in our gator's eye. Falls slightly off one shoulder if you'd like, slightly boxy fit that looks great untucked with skinny jeans or tied up in a little knot over your favorite dress. 

#CajunStardust

Tiffany is wearing a small.

name: Clear as Day
description:
We're clearly excited to present to you the perfect bag for game day or any day. Go long and sport it on your shoulder or double it up and wear it short. The NFL may have given us lemons with the new regulations on purses, but we're adding sugar and giving you lemonade.
7" x 9" 

#NFLapproved #Touchdown 

This clear purse comes with one 6.5" x 4.5" handmade fabric wallet featuring a brass zipper that also meets the new NFL guidelines. Breeze through security with this cute combo!

P.S. Love those shades? Now you can buy New Orleans made KREWE sunglasses right here in our store!
